channel.title: New pvp minigame with looting in 5 days! (RS)
channel.description: Hey guys I just found this post made by Jagex on the Runescape forums telling us about a new pvp minigame that is coming in 5 days and you get half of the other players loot! For full details please read the post Jagex posted on the Runescape forums. *
